protocol.description:
Evaluation_Test_Type: Interval: Below Absolute Minimum
Forecast_Test_Type: EvaluationRecommended based on minimum interval from invalid dose
General_Description: This test case describes when a child greater than 12 months of age is administered a second dose of the Hib vaccine at an interval of 8 weeks - 5 days from the first dose that the dose is not valid.  Another dose should be forecast.
